items.sentence: We're about three blocks from the train station.
Tom looked surprised at how well Mary was doing.
Tom and I haven't seen each other since college.
I have almost three thousand dollars in my safe.
Tom pointed at the restaurant across the street.
Tom picked up the water bottle and took a drink.
It's about three miles from here to the station.
All three of you chop wood every day, don't you?
Tom snapped his fingers and pointed to the door.
Tom's body seems to be accepting the transplant.
Every time I see Tom, he's talking on his phone.
Tom asked me to return the money I had borrowed.
Tom canceled his appointment at the last moment.
Tom is one of the wealthiest men in the country.
Tom leaned in and gave Mary a kiss on the cheek.
Tom marked a sentence with a yellow highlighter.
Can Tom really be as rich as people think he is?
I first met Tom in a little bar outside of town.
You should just do what Tom is asking you to do.
Let's see if Tom can manage to do it by himself.
